img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is navigating a rocky terrain. The character appears to be holding a weapon, possibly a sword, and is positioned near a wooden structure with a tiled roof. The environment includes rocky surfaces and a tree with sparse leaves. The image also shows a user interface with health and stamina bars at the bottom left, and various icons on the bottom right, suggesting gameplay elements such as abilities or items.
